title: YouTube mobile app is getting a redesigned video player
content:
YouTube mobile app is rolling out a new design that makes it easier to access controls when you’re watching videos in full-screen mode. The new interface adds a row of buttons in the bottom left corner (via The Verge). Buttons are revealed when you pause the video or tap anywhere on the screen and let

The post YouTube mobile app is getting a redesigned video player appeared first on xda-developers.
description: YouTube mobile app is rolling out a new design that makes it easier to access controls when you’re watching videos in full-screen mode.
